name: Clogard Toothpaste, Pancha Shakthi
description: A multi-benefit toothpaste with the goodness of Irimedadi Oil. It is made with 100% pure Natural Sri Lankan Herbs. It fights against 5 oral care problems – Cavity Protection, Fresh Breath, Discolouration, Healthy Gums and Plaque removal.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
